00011 template <class Key, class HashFcn = __gnu_cxx::hash<Key> >
00012 class PriorityQueue {
00013 public:
00014   PriorityQueue() {}
00015 
00016   PriorityQueue(const PriorityQueue &other): order(other.order) {
00017     typename order_t::const_iterator i;
00018     for (i = order.begin(); i != order.end(); ++i)
00019       priorities[i->second] = i->first;
00020   }
00021 
00022   PriorityQueue &operator=(const PriorityQueue &other) {
00023     order = other.order;
00024     priorities.clear();
00025     typename order_t::const_iterator i;
00026     for (i = order.begin(); i != order.end(); ++i)
00027       priorities[i->second] = i->first;
00028   }
00029 
00031   const Key &front() const {
00032     assert(order.begin() != order.end());
00033     return order.begin()->second;
00034   }
00035 
00036   double front_priority() const {
00037     assert(order.begin() != order.end());
00038     return order.begin()->first;
00039   }
00040 
00042   unsigned size() const { return order.size(); }
00043 
00045   bool empty() const {
00046     return order.empty();
00047   }
00048 
00050   void pop_front() {
00051     if (!order.empty()) {
00052       typename order_t::iterator it = order.begin();
00053       priorities.erase(it->second);
00054       order.erase(it);
00055     }
00056   }
00057 
00065   void insert(const Key &k, double priority, bool add = false) {
00066     std::pair<typename priorities_t::iterator, bool> ret =
00067       priorities.insert(typename priorities_t::value_type(k, order.end()));
00068     typename order_t::iterator &it = ret.first->second;
00069     if (ret.second) // new key
00070       it = order.insert(typename order_t::value_type(priority,k));
00071     else { // existing key
00072       if (add)
00073         priority += it->first;
00074       if (priority > it->first) {
00075         order.erase(it);
00076         it = order.insert(typename order_t::value_type(priority,k));
00077       }
00078     }
00079   }
00080 
00081 protected:
00082   typedef std::multimap<double, Key, std::greater<double> > order_t;
00083   typedef __gnu_cxx::hash_map<Key,
00084                               typename order_t::iterator,
00085                               HashFcn> priorities_t;
00086 
00087 private:
00088   order_t order;
00089   priorities_t priorities;
00090 };
